title: Laura Carmichael wows in a black minidress as she parties with Lily James at Mr Porter fashion bash
text:
Laura Carmichael partied with Lily James and Billie Piper at the Mr Porter Health In Mind Fund bash, held at Quaglino's in London on Thursday night.

The Downton Abbey actress, 33, looked incredible as she slipped into a black lace minidress, which came complete with a feather tassel hemline.

Lily, 30, and Billie, 37, also looked glamorous as ever as they attended the party after hitting the red carpet for their Rare Beasts premiere.

Leggy display: Laura Carmichael looked incredible as she slipped into a black lace minidress for the Mr Porter Health In Mind Fund bash, held at Quaglino's in London on Thursday night

Laura flaunted her tremendous pins in the thigh-skimming minidress, which featured a high collared neckline and silver pearl buttons.

Keeping accessories to a minimum, the actress added a boost to her height with black point toe heels and wore her light brown locks in soft curls.

Lily, meanwhile, looked sensational in a skintight yellow floral dress which boasted a thigh-high split.

Girls' night out: The actress partied with Lily James, who had earlier on in the night attended the Rare Beast premiere with Billie Piper

Stunning: Lily looked sensational in a skintight yellow floral dress which boasted a thigh-high split

Cute: Laura and Lily appeared to be having a blast at the bash as they posed for a photos at their VIP table

Glamorous: The Mamma Mia star oozed glamour in the number as she posed next to Billie and Louise Dooey (L-R)

Dressed to impress: Lily opted for a simple slick of make-up, complete with matte lipstick and black eyeliner, while Billie slicked her blonde locks off of her face

All eyes on her: Billie, meanwhile, put on a daring display in a skin-baring black dress, which accentuated her incredible physique

The Mamma Mia star oozed glamour in the number which boasted a slight turtleneck and midi-length sleeves.

The racy split of the dress showed off her toned legs which she boosted in a pair of towering black strappy heels.

Her brunette locks were piled into a high topknot, with a few loose tendrils framing her striking features.

Lily opted for a simple slick of make-up, complete with matte lipstick and black eyeliner.

Smile: Billie appeared in high spirits after the premiere of Rare Beasts, which is her directional debut

Racy display: Billie's busty bra and high-waisted pants were visible in the sheer catsuit as she mingled with drag queens

Handsome: Taron Egerton looked dapper in a grey jumper and black drawstring trousers for the bash

Laura and Lily appeared to be having a blast at the bash as they posed for a photos at their VIP table.

Billie, meanwhile, put on a daring display in a skin-baring black dress, which accentuated her incredible physique, layered with a busty bra and high-waisted pants.

The actress had earlier attended the premiere of her film Rare Beasts, in which she both stars in and is also her directional debut.

He's got style: Pixie Lott's fiancé showed off his model looks in a brown double breasted suit jacket

Showing their support: Russell Tovey and India Rose James attend the launch of the MR PORTER charitable fund

Piper stars as the wearsome yet fiesty single mother Mandy, who is juggling bringing up her son with a career at a production company.

The film follows the estranged relationship between her selfish father (David Thewlis) and her mother (Kerry Fox).

Lily has a cameo in the film, portraying a bride at wedding Mandy and her emotionally volatile boyfriend Pete attend.

Last month Laura had her own film premiere for the much-anticipated big screen adaptation of ITV's Downton Abbey.

The actress stars as Lady Edith Crawley in the film, which comes four years after the final episode aired on TV and follows a royal visit to the sprawling manor. It is set in the autumn of 1927.

Dame Maggie, Dockery and Bonneville all reprise their roles, alongside Allen Leech, Dame Penelope Wilton, Joanne Froggatt, Phyllis Logan, Elizabeth McGovern, Jim Carter and Lesley Nicol.
description: Laura Carmichael partied with Lily James and Billie Piper at the Mr Porter Health In Mind Fund bash, held at Quaglino's in London on Thursday night.
